description: The Talus AT Low UltraDry™ is a versatile hiker loaded with features for on-the-move comfort. The shoe’s leather upper provides durability in a low-cut, lighter weight silhouette than its mid-height Talus AT counterpart. A Vasque UltraDry™ membrane creates a full waterproof seal to keep feet dry and comfortable in wet conditions. A Vibram Mega Nuasi outsole ensures solid footing across varying terrain with aggressive traction and toe protection.
name: Vasque Talus AT Low UltraDry, Medium - Mens
